reviewText: When Martina McBride and pop group Train were on CMT Crossroads, had to watch. Enjoy Miss.McBride and sing "Hey, Soul Sister" All the Time and our cat walks out of the room!Have seen this Special 4 Times. So, yes Am a Devotee of Both.Have waited months for this day to arrive. Why this is not a combo of CD/DVD will Never understand. Want both so badly. The Concert is a nice yin/yang of both Train and Miss.McBride's most beloved songs. Truly an hour, yet suppose to have 2 extra songs un~heard prior.So, expect to run longer.Oh, Please. Since the Grammy win for "Hey, Soul Sister",Train has returned from their own mystical tour.Miss.McBride may get shoved by the "newbies" on the block. Yet, "Independence Day" was a cry for help that no Soul could ignore.Local Country stations on Radio banned the song. That was vindication and Truth. She hit a nerve.Abuse exists people. {We just had a case wrap up in Florida that has every Soul divided or shaking their heads}.Pat Moynahan explains the song,"Drops of Jupiter". About his late Mum.He can explain better than me and I will not spoil surprises, endings of films, et cetera... If You really enjoy these lovely Souls, Buy from my favourite web retailer...Yes, Am singing my Anthem as I type,in my mind. The notes Both hit are truly Amazing...Request a Second Concert or better yet, go on the Road together!
